title: Server timed out
content: I can't send messages because the connection to outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.stackmail.com timed out
creator: markscott4

title: Thunderbird search
content: Good morning, I would like to ask you about differencies (0 messages vs. 4 message) in search in TB vs. Outlook. Please see in attachment. Can you help me with this problem pls? I use IMAP settings in both email clients. BR Tibor
creator: tibor.grendel

title: missing items in the group views of Thunderbird
content: Hello, I have set up several mail accounts in Thunderbird. Unfortunately, the inbox of one account is not displayed in the Inbox group, the archive of another account is not displayed in the Archive group and the third account has an entry in the Sent group, but it is out of date. Instead, the current one can be found separately in the ‘Folder’ account. How can I fix this in the grouping view?
creator: web104

title: Junk mail
content: When I download messages, it often says there are say '6 new messages', but only 3 appear on the screen. I'm wondering whether the others are going to Junk, but I am unable to access it. So my question is, how do I access Junk Thanks David White
creator: david.whiteimages
